title: My ward skin disappeared
body:
I'm seeing a similar situation with ward skins and hextech crafting where if you get one that you already own if gives a weird name (something like "loot_skin_ward_rental"). I ended up getting a ward skin shard for Lantern of the Serpent which I bought back in 2013. Since I owned it I disenchanted the ward skin and now it's gone from my ward skin collection. I was unable to select it when playing a game since it wasn't there.

I also don't know how to report this directly since I have lost an item I had purchased, there isn't really an option for submitting a ticket for this sort of thing.

What do I do?

replies.body:
This is a known visual bug going on with a few specific wards. You still own the ward, it just doesn't show up on your profile or in champ select. We're working on a fix, but I don't have a timeline on when that fix will deploy. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you for your reply I was scared I lost it forever lol.
Same, my "definitely not a ward" ward skin disappeared this morning :/
5 of my ward skins just disappered. Is it because of same bugg?
